message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $10,000, which reflects its true worth.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the value you see in it, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose an offer of $7,500.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but this product offers exceptional value. I can come down slightly to $9,500. This feels like a fair compromise.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose an offer of $8,500.
